Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Waives the residency requirement for any appointed public official in Jefferson county
Summary: Waives the residency requirement for any appointed public official in Jefferson county.
LawCode: Amd ยง3, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to waiving the residency requirement for any appointed public official in Jefferson county
